casebody.data:
JOSEPH SAVENELLI v. COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION (14039)

Foti, Landau and Schaller, Js.

Argued March 18 decision released April 2, 1996 David B. Rozwaski, for the appellant (petitioner). Madeline A. Melchionne, assistant attorney general, with whom, on the brief, was Richard Blumenthal, attorney general, for the appellee (respondent). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
